name: Streadata.io API Gallery - TVmaze
description: This is a repository of tvmaze APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: TVmaze
apis.description: Founded in 2014, TVmaze is the leading tv meta-data provider on the web. Serving hundreds of apps and services accoss the web. Providing management tools for users to keep track of their favorite shows.
